title: 01/21/21 DPS Hour 2 Andrew Brandt and Chris Berman
itunes:title: 01/21/21 DPS Hour 2 Andrew Brandt and Chris Berman
description:
Andrew Brandt tells Dan that it is going to be really hard for Watson to get traded. Chris Berman talks to Dan about the change in broadcasting and his days at ESPN.
